content:
I recently tried the Tide Pod Scented Spring Meadow and I have to say, I was really impressed with the fresh and clean scent it left on my clothes. The convenience of the pods also made laundry a lot easier and less messy.

However, I was really disappointed to find out that they don't sell the Spring Meadow scent in stores. I had to purchase a smaller quantity of pods in store, and I ended up paying a lot more for them compared to buying a larger quantity online. It's unfortunate that such a great product isn't readily available in stores, and that consumers have to pay a premium for a smaller quantity.

Overall, I think Tide should consider making the Spring Meadow scent more widely available in stores, at a reasonable price. It's a quality product that I would definitely buy again if it was more accessible and affordable.

content: I've been using Tide Pods for about a decade now, after seeing some reviews saying they don't dissolve & leave stains or discolor your laundry I decided to write a review. I've never had any issue w/the pods, shipping is shipping & Amazon has gotten worse w/how they package, DO leave instructions for your postal carrier ( there's a space for instructions when you're ordering) for specific placement of packages so they aren't left in the sun or contact your post office directly and ask if they can put a note on your address. When loading your washing machine ALWAYS put your pods in first so they're at the bottom of your wash basin, NEVER put the pods in last, on top of the laundry, I've never had a pod not dissolve or any stain from the pods. HE pods are for High Efficiency washing machines which means your machine breaks down the soap bubbles faster, it's suppose to work that way & you're still getting fantastic cleaning power just without excessive sudsy bubbles, it's safe to use HE pods in regular machines too. I mainly use cold water when doing laundry & depending on the item  I'll occasionally use warm water, again, I've never had any issues with Tide Pods & you shouldn't either if, and here's the main thing, you put the pods in 1st, BEFORE any laundry. I hope this helps with any hesitancy you may have and yes, I would highly recommend Tide Pods.
date: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
format_strip: Size: 112 Count (Pack of 1)Scent: Clean Breeze

content: It‚Äôs good

format_strip: Size: 112 Count (Pack of 1)Scent: Spring Meadow
